  62. static ngx_int_t
  63. ‌ngx_stream_upstream_init_least_conn(ngx_conf_t *cf,
  64.     ngx_stream_upstream_srv_conf_t *us)
  65. {
  66.     ngx_log_debug0(NGX_LOG_DEBUG_STREAM, cf->log, 0,
  67.                    "init least conn");

  69.     if (ngx_stream_upstream_init_round_robin(cf, us) != NGX_OK) {
  70.         return NGX_ERROR;
  71.     }

  73.     us->peer.init = ngx_stream_upstream_init_least_conn_peer;

  75.     return NGX_OK;
  76. }


  79. static ngx_int_t
  80. ‌ngx_stream_upstream_init_least_conn_peer(ngx_stream_session_t *s,
  81.     ngx_stream_upstream_srv_conf_t *us)
  82. {
  83.     ngx_log_debug0(NGX_LOG_DEBUG_STREAM, s->connection->log, 0,
  84.                    "init least conn peer");

  86.     if (ngx_stream_upstream_init_round_robin_peer(s, us) != NGX_OK) {
  87.         return NGX_ERROR;
  88.     }

  90.     s->upstream->peer.get = ngx_stream_upstream_get_least_conn_peer;

  92.     return NGX_OK;
  93. }


  96. static ngx_int_t
  97. ‌ngx_stream_upstream_get_least_conn_peer(ngx_peer_connection_t *pc, void *data)
  98. {
  99.     ngx_stream_upstream_rr_peer_data_t *rrp = data;

  101.     time_t                           now;
  102.     uintptr_t                        m;
  103.     ngx_int_t                        rc, total;
  104.     ngx_uint_t                       i, n, p, many;
  105.     ngx_stream_upstream_rr_peer_t   *peer, *best;
  106.     ngx_stream_upstream_rr_peers_t  *peers;

  108.     ngx_log_debug1(NGX_LOG_DEBUG_STREAM, pc->log, 0,
  109.                    "get least conn peer, try: %ui", pc->tries);

  111.     if (rrp->peers->single) {
  112.         return ngx_stream_upstream_get_round_robin_peer(pc, rrp);
  113.     }

  115.     pc->connection = NULL;

  117.     now = ngx_time();

  119.     peers = rrp->peers;

  121.     ngx_stream_upstream_rr_peers_wlock(peers);

  123.     best = NULL;
  124.     total = 0;

  126. #if (NGX_SUPPRESS_WARN)
  127.     many = 0;
  128.     p = 0;
  129. #endif

  131.     for (peer = peers->peer, i = 0;
  132.          peer;
  133.          peer = peer->next, i++)
  134.     {

  136.         n = i / (8 * sizeof(uintptr_t));
  137.         m = (uintptr_t) 1 << i % (8 * sizeof(uintptr_t));

  139.         if (rrp->tried[n] & m) {
  140.             continue;
  141.         }

  143.         if (peer->down) {
  144.             continue;
  145.         }

  147.         if (peer->max_fails
  148.             && peer->fails >= peer->max_fails
  149.             && now - peer->checked <= peer->fail_timeout)
  150.         {
  151.             continue;
  152.         }

  154.         /*
  155.          * select peer with least number of connections; if there are
  156.          * multiple peers with the same number of connections, select
  157.          * based on round-robin
  158.          */

  160.         if (best == NULL
  161.             || peer->conns * best->weight < best->conns * peer->weight)
  162.         {
  163.             best = peer;
  164.             many = 0;
  165.             p = i;

  167.         } else if (peer->conns * best->weight == best->conns * peer->weight) {
  168.             many = 1;
  169.         }
  170.     }

  172.     if (best == NULL) {
  173.         ngx_log_debug0(NGX_LOG_DEBUG_STREAM, pc->log, 0,
  174.                        "get least conn peer, no peer found");

  176.         goto failed;
  177.     }

  179.     if (many) {
  180.         ngx_log_debug0(NGX_LOG_DEBUG_STREAM, pc->log, 0,
  181.                        "get least conn peer, many");

  183.         for (peer = best, i = p;
  184.              peer;
  185.              peer = peer->next, i++)
  186.         {
  187.             n = i / (8 * sizeof(uintptr_t));
  188.             m = (uintptr_t) 1 << i % (8 * sizeof(uintptr_t));

  190.             if (rrp->tried[n] & m) {
  191.                 continue;
  192.             }

  194.             if (peer->down) {
  195.                 continue;
  196.             }

  198.             if (peer->conns * best->weight != best->conns * peer->weight) {
  199.                 continue;
  200.             }

  202.             if (peer->max_fails
  203.                 && peer->fails >= peer->max_fails
  204.                 && now - peer->checked <= peer->fail_timeout)
  205.             {
  206.                 continue;
  207.             }

  209.             peer->current_weight += peer->effective_weight;
  210.             total += peer->effective_weight;

  212.             if (peer->effective_weight < peer->weight) {
  213.                 peer->effective_weight++;
  214.             }

  216.             if (peer->current_weight > best->current_weight) {
  217.                 best = peer;
  218.                 p = i;
  219.             }
  220.         }
  221.     }

  223.     best->current_weight -= total;

  225.     if (now - best->checked > best->fail_timeout) {
  226.         best->checked = now;
  227.     }

  229.     pc->sockaddr = best->sockaddr;
  230.     pc->socklen = best->socklen;
  231.     pc->name = &best->name;

  233.     best->conns++;

  235.     rrp->current = best;

  237.     n = p / (8 * sizeof(uintptr_t));
  238.     m = (uintptr_t) 1 << p % (8 * sizeof(uintptr_t));

  240.     rrp->tried[n] |= m;

  242.     ngx_stream_upstream_rr_peers_unlock(peers);

  244.     return NGX_OK;

  246. failed:

  248.     if (peers->next) {
  249.         ngx_log_debug0(NGX_LOG_DEBUG_STREAM, pc->log, 0,
  250.                        "get least conn peer, backup servers");

  252.         rrp->peers = peers->next;

  254.         n = (rrp->peers->number + (8 * sizeof(uintptr_t) - 1))
  255.                 / (8 * sizeof(uintptr_t));

  257.         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
  258.             rrp->tried[i] = 0;
  259.         }

  261.         ngx_stream_upstream_rr_peers_unlock(peers);

  263.         rc = ngx_stream_upstream_get_least_conn_peer(pc, rrp);

  265.         if (rc != NGX_BUSY) {
  266.             return rc;
  267.         }

  269.         ngx_stream_upstream_rr_peers_wlock(peers);
  270.     }

  272.     /* all peers failed, mark them as live for quick recovery */

  274.     for (peer = peers->peer; peer; peer = peer->next) {
  275.         peer->fails = 0;
  276.     }

  278.     ngx_stream_upstream_rr_peers_unlock(peers);

  280.     pc->name = peers->name;

  282.     return NGX_BUSY;
  283. }


  286. static char *
  287. ‌ngx_stream_upstream_least_conn(ngx_conf_t *cf, ngx_command_t *cmd, void *conf)
  288. {
  289.     ngx_stream_upstream_srv_conf_t  *uscf;

  291.     uscf = ngx_stream_conf_get_module_srv_conf(cf, ngx_stream_upstream_module);

  293.     if (uscf->peer.init_upstream) {
  294.         ngx_conf_log_error(NGX_LOG_WARN, cf, 0,
  295.                            "load balancing method redefined");
  296.     }

  298.     uscf->peer.init_upstream = ngx_stream_upstream_init_least_conn;

  300.     uscf->flags = NGX_STREAM_UPSTREAM_CREATE
  301.                   |NGX_STREAM_UPSTREAM_WEIGHT
  302.                   |NGX_STREAM_UPSTREAM_MAX_FAILS
  303.                   |NGX_STREAM_UPSTREAM_FAIL_TIMEOUT
  304.                   |NGX_STREAM_UPSTREAM_DOWN
  305.                   |NGX_STREAM_UPSTREAM_BACKUP;

  307.     return NGX_CONF_OK;
  308. }
